DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Version 1.0 Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Abilities PC6 Past 7 Days Able to Concentrate Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how much during the past 7 days they have been able to concentrate, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Mental Health Domain Cognitive Function Abilities Past Week Able to Concentrate Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's mental health._A patient reported outcome instrument that assesses patient-perceived functional abilities related to cognitive tasks._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual is or was able to concentrate._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how much of something an individual experiences from 1: Not at all, to 5: Very much.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: PROMIS Item Banks (Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System)

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
